title: Ep 12 | Nervous Preachers, Tower of Babel, and Confusing Languages
description:
There are 6,500 spoken languages in the world today. How were they all created? Phil, Al, and Jase dive deep into the history of languages and the tower of Babel in this week's episode of Unashamed. 

See episodes of "Unashamed with Phil Robertson": https://bit.ly/2J4XsiX

 

See clips from Phil's TV show "In the Woods with Phil": https://bit.ly/2PNM6k1

 

To take a FREE 30 Day Trial of Phil's TV show and the rest of BlazeTV: https://www.BlazeTV.com/Phil
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
